PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-01432013-02-14,  ,  ,  AANDC, 
ActIndian Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Indian Referendum Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the INDIAN REFERENDUM REGULATIONS in order to speed up the designation process by (1) reducing the voting threshold for a land designation from a double majority to a simple majority vote; and (2) allowing the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, rather than the Governor in Council, to accept land designations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0021 Publication Date: 2013-02-27
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Indian Referendum Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the INDIAN REFERENDUM REGULATIONS in order to speed up the designation process by (1) reducing the voting threshold for a land designation from a double majority to a simple majority vote; and (2) allowing the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, rather than the Governor in Council, to accept land designations.
